Using this class user can upload different asset in different repositories

This is cache class that provide a bridge for different type of caches

Database¶

class db.connection.ConnectionString(db_type)[source]¶

Provider database connection string

class db.mssql.MsSqlDb(connection_str)[source]¶

This core class provide supporting function (CRUD Operations) for MS SQL Server.

class db.mysql.MySqlDb(connection_str)[source]¶

This core class provide supporting function (CRUD Operations) for MySQL Server.

class db.oracle.OracleDb(connection_str)[source]¶

This core class provide supporting function (CRUD Operations) for Oracle Database.

class db.postgre.PostgreDb(connection_str)[source]¶

This core class provide supporting function (CRUD Operations) for Postgre Server.

Utilities¶

utilities.constant.CONFIG_SECTION_ASSET = 'CLOUDINARY'¶

To read asset storage setting from the config file framework using CONFIG_SECTION_ASSET constant to access.

CONFIG_SECTION_ASSET = “CLOUDINARY”

utilities.constant.CONFIG_SECTION_CACHE = 'REDIS'¶

To read Temp cache storge setting from the configuration file system utilize CONFIG_SECTION_CACHE constant.

CONFIG_SECTION_CACHE = “REDIS”

utilities.constant.CONFIG_SECTION_DATABASE = 'DATABASE'¶

To read database crediental from the configuration from system using Constant CONFIG_SECTION_DATABASE to access the DB settings.

CONFIG_SECTION_DATABASE = “DATABASE”

utilities.constant.CONFIG_SECTION_LOG = 'LOGS'¶

To read logging setting from configuration file system using CONFIG_SECTION_LOG constant to access.

CONFIG_SECTION_LOG = “LOGS”

utilities.constant.DB_TYPE_MSSQL_SERVER = 'MSSQLSERVER'¶

Database type constant DB_TYPE_MSSQL_SERVER value is “MSSQLSERVER”.

utilities.constant.DB_TYPE_MYSQL_SERVER = 'MYSQLSERVER'¶

Database type constant DB_TYPE_MYSQL_SERVER value is “MYSQLSERVER”.

utilities.constant.DB_TYPE_ORACLE = 'ORACLE'¶

Database type constant DB_TYPE_ORACLE value is “ORACLE”.

utilities.constant.DB_TYPE_POSTGRESQL = 'POSTGRESQL'¶

Database type constant DB_TYPE_POSTGRESQL value is “POSTGRESQL”.

utilities.constant.LOG_ERRORS = 'ERRORS'¶

Logging Type LOG_ERRORS value is “ERRORS”.

utilities.constant.LOG_INFO = 'INFO'¶

Logging Type LOG_INFO value is “INFO”.

utilities.constant.STORAGE_TYPE_CLOUDINARY = 'CLOUDINARY'¶

For Storage Type STORAGE_TYPE_IMGIX value is “IMGIX”.

utilities.constant.STORAGE_TYPE_IMGIX = 'IMGIX'¶

For Storage Type STORAGE_TYPE_IMGIX value is “IMGIX”.

utilities.constant.STORAGE_TYPE_S3 = 'AWS_S3'¶

For Storage Type STORAGE_TYPE_IMGIX value is “IMGIX”.
